data.name: Dismay
data.detailed_description:
You play as a detective, who is investigating the disappearances of several people around an old, abandoned mansion. You must survive long enough to discover the mystery of the strange mansion and escape. Use your detective abilities to find clues, solve complex and unique puzzles and discover hidden lore around the mansion and its past. You must survive while being chased by a nearly invincible monster hiding in the shadows.

Story

In the remote mountains of New York State, a forest filled with unspeakable horrors waits for its next unlucky victim. A long-abandoned mansion that once belonged to a rich businessman, who went missing from his home, is the main focus of the several missing person cases. Detective Alaina Dixon travels to the nightmare forest to uncover the mystery of the forest and what happened to the missing people. Her only hope of escaping lies with the terrible truth at the heart of the mansion.

Environment

The game is set inside a huge abandoned mansion within a nearly endless forest. Explore the mansion and its surroundings to solve the mystery and discover what happened to the missing people. As you wander the lonely corridors and explore every inch of the mansion, you will learn about the mansion's dark secrets and uncover the fates of the missing souls.

Gameplay

You only have a limited amount weapons that can save you from the horrifying creatures stalking you from the shadows. You can pick up key items, solve complex puzzles, and search for things that can help you escape the mansion. You can use your detective abilities to find clues, use your environment to hide the thing trying to kill you, and slow them down.

data.short_description: Dismay is a first-person survival horror game, which follows the story of a detective, who is investigating an abandoned mansion. Use your detective abilities to find clues, solve complex and unique puzzles and discover hidden lore about the mansion and its past.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 ／ AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ／ AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 ／ AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 ／ AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
